text: is a Japanese manga artist. Her main works are Hey Pitan!, Higepiyo and Oruchuban Ebichu ("Ebichu Minds the House"). Oruchuban Ebichu was produced as an animated TV program for Gainax. She was born in Hara town, Suwa District in Nagano Prefecture. == Work == * Hey Pitan! * Oruchuban Ebichu * Higepiyo * One Woman, Two Cats * Onna no Mado == Awards == * 2005 Kodansha Manga Award for shōjo - Oi Pītan!! * 2006 Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize Short Story Award - One Woman, * Two Cats, Oi Piitan!! * Onna no Mado ==Other websites== * * Risa Itō Web Site * Profile Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese manga artists Category:Japanese writers
title: Risa Itō
